alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 11:11AM EST until March 11 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford down to Williams. White River from at Edwardsport down to Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Minor flooding is ongoing across southern Indiana due to widespread 2 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is expected to end Saturday on the East Fork White River... although minor flooding is expected to persist on lower portions of the White River well into next week with additional rain expected tonight and again this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.5 feet, Water is near the center of the road at the first curve out of the Bedford Boat Club. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM EST Thursday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
